name: Advantage
Lore: 'With only a few Jedi remaining in the galaxy, each confrontation between them has far reaching consequences.',
Text: 'If an opponent''s character of ability > 3 was just lost in a battle or duel you won, deploy on one of your warriors involved. Warrior is power +2. During each of opponent''s move phases, opponent loses 1 Force (2 if character was a Dark Jedi). (Immune to Control.)',
